name: The South Carolina Writers Association 2017 ‘Big Dream’ Conference
content: The 2017 South Carolina Writers Association is proud to announce our ‘Big’ conference, affectionately named the ‘Big Dream’ conference where writers are given the chance to dream big and enjoy a weekend writing retreat at Litchfield Beach & Golf Resort on Pawley’s Island, while meeting well-established and successful authors, editors and agents. Optional add on pitch and synopsis critiques available. Plan to spend a weekend full of exciting, inspiring, creative, jumpstarts to ‘Your’ writing, networking with writing buddies old and new. For more details or to register visit: www.myscwa.org
